text: Wigan Wallgate Carriage Sidings is a stabling point located in Wigan, Lancashire, England. The depot is situated to the west of Wigan Wallgate railway station, and is located on the Manchester to Southport Line. == History == In 1987 the depot had no allocation, but was a stabling point for DMUs. == Allocation == As of 2016, the depot has no allocation. It is, instead, a stabling point for Northern Class 142 Pacers and Class 150/156 Sprinters. ==References== ===Sources=== * Category:Railway depots in England Category:Rail transport in Lancashire
title: Wigan Wallgate Carriage Sidings
